{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.05278v1", "title": "Inverse problems for semilinear elliptic equations with low regularity", "summary": "We show that a general nonlinearity $a(x,u)$ is uniquely determined, possibly
up to a gauge, in a neighborhood of a fixed solution from boundary measurements
of the corresponding semilinear equation. The main theorems are low regularity
counterparts of the results in Johansson-Nurminen-Salo (2023).", "main_category": "math.AP", "categories": "math.AP", "published": "2025-05-08T14:25:20Z"}
